name: Animus Robotis
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 27"Beneath the Surface"

My 4th Ludum Dare entry, and first Solo Ludum Dare entry, and I finished it so I've met my goal! I was worried about graphics with out a dedicated artist, but I surprised myself! ^_^
The game engine I put together for this is a bit buggy, so hopefully it runs for everyone (Linux input is a bit messed up, but should be passable). 

Controls
  • Move/Jump - WASD or Arrows
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Shoot - Left Click
